name: QuadMage
description:
Description: A top-down arcade shooter where you control a mage that shoots in 4 cardinal directions: north, east, south, and west. Rotate around the enemies and collect life-saving powerups to challenge your high score!

Controls: Move the mage with arrow keys or WASD keys. Shoot the projectile with space bar. Click with the mouse to navigate UIs.

Powerups:

Blue jem - freezes enemies

Red jem - can fire 2 projectiles at once

Grey jem - makes player unable to die

Exiting the Game: Cmd + Q on Mac. Alt + f4 on Windows.

Created By:

Programmer - Won Yang

Art - Jenna Stetter

Music - Won Yang (all except title screen), Hyeon Yang (title screen)

(We also used free CC sprite assets and sounds)
